text: Gregory Wayne "Greg" Abbott (born November 13, 1957) is an American lawyer and Republican politician. He is currently the Governor of Texas. He defeated Wendy Davis in the November 4, 2014 general election. Prior to being governor, he was the 50th Attorney General of Texas. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Profile at the Texas Tribune * Coverage at the Texas Observer Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Texas Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:20th-century American politicians Category:21st-century American politicians Category:American Roman Catholics Category:American judges Category:American political writers Category:Lawyers from Houston Category:Politicians from Houston Category:American people with disabilities Category:Writers from Houston Category:Texas attorneys general
title: Greg Abbott
